item.title: 私人信贷进军投资级成为 IPEM 会议的话题
item.description: 在本周于巴黎举行的一次高管聚会上，私营信贷巨头向蓝筹股公司提供贷款的举措成为焦点，因为这有可能推动该行业未来的增长。【原文：Moves by private credit giants to muscle into lending to blue-chip firms took center stage at a gathering of executives in Paris this week, given the potential to propel the industry’s future growth.】

item.title: 奢侈品价格下跌导致债务违约，华伦天奴正与银行谈判
item.description: 华伦天奴（Valentino SpA）正在与债权人进行谈判，据熟悉此事的人士透露，奢侈品需求放缓打击了该公司的业绩，导致这家时装公司违反了债务条款。【原文：Valentino SpA is in talks with creditors after a slowdown in demand for luxury goods battered its results, leading the fashion house to breach the terms of its debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 罗杰斯酝酿 IPO 或私人资本，打造体育帝国
item.description: 罗杰斯通信公司（Rogers Communications Inc）首席执行官表示，私人投资者对入股该公司的体育和娱乐业务兴趣浓厚，因为这家加拿大公司正在讨论未来是否将其体育资产上市。【原文：Rogers Communications Inc. is drawing broad interest from private investors for a stake in its sports and entertainment business, its chief executive officer said, as the Canadian company debates whether to take its sports assets public in the future.】

item.title: 英国石油公司（BP）、维托尔公司（Vitol）引领北海现货市场原油竞标狂潮
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）和维托尔集团（Vitol Group）在一个关键的北海定价窗口引领了竞价热潮，这是市场走强的最新短期迹象，因为油价继续打破今年最后几个月将出现大量过剩的预期。【原文：BP Plc and Vitol Group led a surge of bids in a key North Sea pricing window, the latest short-term sign of a stronger market as prices continue to defy expectations of a major surplus in the final months of the year.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯谈我们时代的重大问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 企业国债购买量暴跌 76%，加密货币的大锚扣住了
item.description: 比特币本应进入一个新时代。华尔街通过数字资产国债将加密货币嵌入企业资产负债表，承诺了稳定和增长。现在，这个机构锚正在倒塌，暴露出了先前市场周期中的类似脆弱性。【原文：Bitcoin was supposed to have entered a new era. Wall Street’s embrace, through digital-asset treasuries designed to embed the cryptocurrency into corporate balance sheets, promised stability and growth. Now that institutional anchor is buckling, exposing similar fragilities that have defined earlier market cycles.】

item.title: 中国人民银行誓言保持宽松政策，维持充足流动性
item.description: 在中国经济继续面临内需不足和物价低迷挑战的情况下，中国央行承诺维持适度宽松的货币政策和充足的流动性，以支持经济复苏。【原文：China’s central bank has pledged to maintain a moderately loose monetary stance and ample liquidity to support economic recovery, as the economy continues to face challenges from insufficient domestic demand and low prices.】

item.title: 通胀数据符合预期，美国国债上涨
item.description: 通胀数据符合预期，使美联储有望在下月继续降息，国债因此上涨。【原文：Treasuries gained after a reading on inflation came in as expected, leaving the Federal Reserve on track to continue cutting interest rates next month.】

item.title: 布莱恩特-莱利寻求用多年动荡换取扭亏计划
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc.【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. is still standing.】

item.title: 石油交易商预计欧佩克+将再次达成增产协议
item.description: 石油交易商认为，欧佩克+同意在 11 月份恢复更多生产，因为该组织正努力夺回全球市场份额。【原文：Oil traders see OPEC+ agreeing to revive more production in November as the group strives to reclaim global market share.】

item.title: 希腊总理称希腊支持跨国银行收购
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）表示，他赞成欧洲的跨国银行整合，并欢迎意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对阿尔法银行（Alpha Bank SA）的投资。【原文：Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said he’s in favor of cross-border bank consolidation in Europe and welcomes the investment by Italy’s UniCredit SpA in Alpha Bank SA.】

item.title: 美国消费者支出超出预期，核心通胀率保持稳定
item.description: 由于基本通胀压力保持稳定，美国 8 月份个人支出的增幅超过了预期，这说明消费者的韧性很强。【原文：US personal spending rose in August by more than forecast as underlying inflationary pressures held steady, illustrating a resilient consumer.】

item.title: 加拿大经济有望在第三季度反弹
item.description: 随着第三季度的强劲反弹，加拿大经济今年似乎有望避免技术性衰退。【原文：The Canadian economy appears set to avoid a technical recession this year with a strong third-quarter rebound.】

item.title: 捷克军火亿万富翁斯特尔纳德收购维克托里亚-比尔森足球俱乐部
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁米哈尔-斯特尔纳德（Michal Strnad）签署了一份合同，购买维克多利亚-比尔森足球俱乐部（FC Viktoria Plzen）的多数股份，加入了拥有该国顶级球队的能源和工业富豪行列。【原文：Czech billionaire Michal Strnad signed a contract to buy a majority stake in football club FC Viktoria Plzen, joining a group of energy and industrial tycoons who own top teams in the country.】

item.title: 巴西 Braskem 公司聘请顾问优化资本结构
item.description: Braskem SA 公司聘请了财务和法律顾问，以寻找优化其资本结构的方法，因为该公司正在努力应对石化行业衰退的影响以及长达数年之久的环境灾难所带来的后果。【原文：Braskem SA hired financial and legal advisers to find ways to optimize its capital structure as it grapples with the effects of a downturn in the petrochemicals sector and fallout from a years-long environmental disaster.】

item.title: 智利央行认为有必要对利率变动进行仔细分析
item.description: 根据智利央行上次政策会议的记录，该行表示存在 "不应忽视或淡化 "的通胀风险，任何利率变动都需要经过仔细分析。【原文：Chile’s central bank said there are inflation risks that “should not be ignored or downplayed” and that any moves to its interest rate require a careful analysis, according to the minutes to its last policy meeting.】

item.title: CarMax 做空者在一天内从 20% 的跌幅中套现 1.71 亿美元
item.description: 虽然 CarMax Inc. 的财报及随后 20% 的飙升令华尔街的预期落空，但这一严重失利却为做空者带来了 1.71 亿美元的收益。【原文：While CarMax Inc.’s earnings results — and subsequent 20% rout — dashed Wall Street’s expectations, the stark miss has been a $171 million boon to short-sellers.】

item.title: 需求减弱，印度将削减长期限债券发行量
item.description: 由于保险和养老基金的需求出现放缓迹象，印度将在未来六个月内减少发行期限较长的债券。【原文：India will scale back the issuance of longer-maturity bonds over the next six months, as demand from insurance and pension funds shows signs of easing.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳钻石销售失败，买家拒绝付款
item.description: 博茨瓦纳在一次史无前例的临时拍卖会上没有卖出任何钻石，因为买家拒绝支付足够高的价格，而全球钻石业仍在努力应对有史以来最严重的危机之一。【原文：Botswana didn’t sell any diamonds in an unprecedented ad-hoc auction as buyers refused to pay high enough prices, as the global industry continues to grapple with one of its deepest-ever crises.】

item.title: 特朗普收紧 H-1B 规定，印度为技术工人流动辩护
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）决定对H-1B签证实施严格限制几天后，印度周五表示，印度和美国经济都从技术人才流动中受益匪浅。【原文：India said Friday that both the Indian and US economies have benefited significantly from the movement of skilled talent, days after President Donald Trump’s decision to impose severe restrictions on H-1B visas.】

item.title: 世界银行法庭禁止尼日尔销售索迈尔矿的铀矿石
item.description: 今年早些时候，西非国家军政府从法国核电公司手中夺取了索迈尔（Somaïr）矿，世界银行仲裁机构命令尼日尔不得交易该公司的铀矿。【原文：A World Bank arbitration body ordered Niger to refrain from trading Orano SA’s uranium from the Somaïr mine that the West African nation’s junta seized from the French nuclear-power company earlier this year.】

item.title: 德国警方开展与北方数据有关的突袭行动
item.description: 法兰克福检察官周五表示，德国警方对数据中心公司 Northern Data AG 进行了突击检查。【原文：German police carried out raids related to data center company Northern Data AG, Frankfurt-based prosecutors said on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔金称就业和通胀面临的风险有限
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，虽然失业率和通胀率都偏离了美国中央银行的目标，但他认为这两方面进一步恶化的风险有限。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said while unemployment and inflation have both moved away from the US central bank’s goals, he sees only limited risk of further deterioration on both fronts.】

item.title: GA Credit 旗舰基金完成 21 亿美元首笔交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，通用大西洋信贷公司（General Atlantic Credit）为其最新的机会主义信贷基金完成了 21 亿美元的首笔交易，这是一个最新迹象，表明长期的高利率环境正促使企业寻求更具创造性的融资方式。【原文：General Atlantic Credit has hit a $2.1 billion first close for its latest opportunistic credit fund, according to people with knowledge of the matter, in the latest sign that the prolonged higher-rate environment is pushing companies to seek more creative ways to raise capital.】

item.title: 丹-艾夫斯和汤姆-李用社交媒体传声筒绕过华尔街
item.description: 战胜市场很难，最近赢得新资金更难。然而，就在许多选股人眼睁睁地看着自己的客户离场时，两位华尔街大牛却在社交媒体上大放异彩。【原文：Beating the market is hard, and lately, winning new money even harder. Yet two Wall Street bulls with social-media megaphones are doing both, just as many stock pickers are watching their clients walk away.】

item.title: 莫迪宣布在印度投票日所在邦投入 8.45 亿美元
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）在地方选举前宣布向印度贫困的比哈尔邦妇女发放超过 8.45 亿美元的现金。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced cash handouts of more than $845 million to women in the impoverished Indian state of Bihar before local elections, which are seen as a crucial test of his popularity as he looks to consolidate power.】

item.title: 英国石油公司的石油需求峰值转变捕捉到了行业的时代精神
item.description:
曾经看似迅速脱离粗制滥造，现在看来更像是一种拖沓的高原反应。【原文：

What once looked like a rapid pivot away from crude now appears more like a drawn-out plateau.

】

item.title: 欧盟对从俄罗斯进口的化肥展开反倾销调查
item.description: 在欧盟化肥生产商抱怨从俄罗斯进口的尿素压低了市场价格之后，欧盟对进口尿素展开了调查。【原文：The European Union opened an investigation into urea imports from Russia after fertilizer producers in the bloc complained the shipments undercut market prices.】

item.title: 美国签证政策的不确定性促使科技人才向新的中心转移
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，Sankalp Phartiyal 将探讨美国移民管制对美国大型科技巨头员工情绪的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Sankalp Phartiyal addresses the impact of US immigration controls on the mood among workers powering the country’s big tech juggernauts.】

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯的英国预算是多年来最艰难的预算之一
item.description: 我是乔-梅耶斯，驻伦敦的英国政府记者。今天我们将关注英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）面临的预算挑战。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Joe Mayes, a UK government reporter in London.
